changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored Delete row WHERE LANE IS null in table LANE_TRAVEL_DATA as there are no rows with null LANE values

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM CLASS_LANE_TRAVEL_DATA WHERE LANE_TRAVEL_OID IN (SELECT LANE_TRAVEL_OID FROM LANE_TRAVEL_DATA WHERE LANE IS null)
DELETE FROM LANE_TRAVEL_DATA WHERE LANE IS null

changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored AlterColumn for LANE of table LANE_TRAVEL_DATA as column does not exist or column is already not nullable

changeSet.comment: {JIRA}: AlterColumn LANE_TRAVEL_DATA.LANE - nullability changed from true to false
